title: ootttii
author: ootttii
content: I run full monero node & cli wallet under Ubuntu and I want to run my own pool as well. Pls can someone give me advice how to create it? I found something very old on youtube but its outdated...

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: This may help you start - https://github.com/jtgrassie/monero-pool
